title: Central Square Three Bed in an UNBEATABLE location!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 293837704', 'Rent: $4,650 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Lovely, large 3 bed right in Central Sq!', 'Easy access to everything by foot, T, or car!', 'Renovated kitchen with a dishwasher, central air, and free laundry in the basement!', 'A must see!', '- Central heating and cooling', '- Free laundry', '- Hardwood floors', '- Easy access to the Red Line', '- Bonus storage room off of one of the bedrooms', 'Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!', 'Encore Realty', 'Share your search criteria with me here:', '<URL>', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
